    • Field Detail

      • packman

        private java.util.ArrayList<Packman> packman
        The class ShortestPathAlgo represents the algorithm which calculating the paths of eating for all the pacman. At first the algorithm calculating for each pacman its closest fruit,saving the result in a new array, now the algorithm takes the pacman with the least time to its specific fruit from the new array, the pacman will move forward and removed from the array, the fruit is no longer can be eaten ,now do the same as long there are pacman in the new array after that,building a new array without the fruits which have been eaten .keep running as long there are fruit which can be eaten.

                     java.util.ArrayList<shortestTime> temp)

        Parameters:
        index - of the location in solution array.
        temp - the arraylist with the fruitId which is no longer in the game
        Returns:
        true if the fruit is free,and false if not
